divs: Sighting Detailsi was having dinner and suddenly i heard many of the neighbor dogs were barking at the same time so i looked outside my window and i saw three or four blinking white lights, i thought it was a plane but it didn't move at all and doesn't have green and red lights like an usual airplane
Summary: Saw very unusual lights in the sky over Perth, AU.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Perth
There was one other sighting in Perth on or around January 24th 2009
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
